K10sf276_sc:1: Wal_1 evaṁ mayā śrutam / ekasamayaṁ bhagavāṁ caṁpāyāṁ viharati gargarapuṣkariṇyās tīre /
K10sf276_sc:2: Wal_2 tena khalu samayena rāhuṇā asurendreṇa sarvaṁ candramaṇḍalam āvṛtaṁ /
K10sf276_sc:3: Wal_3 atha yā devatā tasmiṁ candramaṇḍale sthitā bhītā trastā saṁvignā hṛṣṭaromakūpā yena
K10sf276_sc:4: bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma / upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte ’sthāt / ekāntasthitā
K10sf276_sc:6: Wal_4 namas te buddha vīrāstu vipramuktāya savataḥ /
K10sf276_sc:8: Wal_5 loke sugatam arhantaṁ candramāḥ śaraṇaṁ gataḥ /
K10sf276_sc:15: Wal_7 … / saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ / saṁtvaramāṇo ’sau rāhuś candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭaḥ //
K10sf276_sc:16: Wal_8 tena samayena baḍir virocanapautra āsīd asuraḥ / adrākṣīd baḍir virocanapautro rāhuṇā asurendreṇa tvaritatvaritaṁ candramaṇḍalam utsṛṣṭam dṛṣṭvā ca tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe //
K10sf276_sc:17: Wal_9 kiṁ nu saṁtvaramāṇas tvaṁ rāhuś candraṁ vimuñcasi / saṁsvinnagātro vyathitaḥ saṁbādhito yathā naraḥ //
K10sf276_sc:18: Wal_10 rāhur avocat // saptadhā me sphalen mūrdhā jīvan na sukham āpnuyāṁ tatra buddhābhigītena muñceyaṁ śaśinaṁ na cet //
